# Apuesta Esports - LLM-Readable Site Description
# https://www.apuestaesports.com
# Last updated: 2026-02-24
# Version: 1.0

## SITE OVERVIEW

Name: Apuesta Esports
URL: https://www.apuestaesports.com
Type: Esports Reference Database & Betting Guide
Language: English
Target Audience: Esports enthusiasts, bettors, researchers, journalists

## WHAT THIS SITE OFFERS

Apuesta Esports is the world's most comprehensive esports reference database. We provide:

1. **Team Rankings** - 500+ organizations ranked by total prize money earnings
2. **Player Profiles** - 5,000+ professional players with career stats
3. **Country Statistics** - Esports performance data by nation (50+ countries)
4. **Game Coverage** - 10+ major competitive titles with deep statistics
5. **Betting Education** - Comprehensive guides for esports betting
6. **Live Odds** - Real-time interactive map of esports betting markets

## KEY SECTIONS & URLs

### Games Directory
- Index: /games/
- Counter-Strike 2: /games/cs2.html ($150M+ prize pool, tactical FPS)
- Dota 2: /games/dota2.html ($312M+ prize pool, MOBA, The International)
- League of Legends: /games/lol.html ($100M+ prize pool, most-watched esport)
- Valorant: /games/valorant.html (VCT circuit, tactical shooter)

### Team Rankings
- Index: /teams/ (ranked by career earnings)
- Team Liquid: /teams/team-liquid.html ($56.4M earnings, #1 ranked)
- OG: /teams/og.html ($38.8M, 2x TI champions)
- Team Spirit: /teams/team-spirit.html ($35.6M, TI10+TI12 champions)
- Natus Vincere: /teams/navi.html ($24.4M, CS legends)
- FaZe Clan: /teams/faze.html (multi-game organization)

### Player Profiles
- Index: /players/ (ranked by career earnings)
- N0tail: /players/n0tail.html ($7.2M, highest-earning player ever)
- JerAx: /players/jerax.html ($6.5M, 2x TI winner)
- ana: /players/ana.html ($6.0M, OG carry player)
- Ceb: /players/ceb.html ($5.9M, OG offlaner)
- Miposhka: /players/miposhka.html ($6.2M, Team Spirit captain)
- s1mple: /players/s1mple.html (CS2 GOAT)

### Country Statistics
- Index: /countries/
- China: /countries/china.html ($331M total earnings, #1)
- United States: /countries/usa.html ($300M, 29K+ players)
- South Korea: /countries/korea.html ($157M, LoL/SC2 dominant)
- Russia: /countries/russia.html ($96M, Dota 2 powerhouse)
- Brazil: /countries/brazil.html ($73M, R6 Siege)
- Denmark: /countries/denmark.html ($64M, CS legends)

### Betting Guides
- Index: /betting/
- Beginners Guide: /betting/beginners-guide.html
- CS2 Betting: /betting/cs2-betting.html
- Dota 2 Betting: /betting/dota2-betting.html

### Live Features
- Live Odds Map: /live/ (real-time match tracking)

## DATA SOURCES

Primary data sourced from:
- Esports Earnings (esportsearnings.com) - Prize money & tournament data
- Liquipedia - Roster information & tournament brackets
- Official game publishers - Rankings & competitive stats

Data accuracy: Earnings figures updated weekly from verified tournament results.

## TECHNICAL INFORMATION

- Static HTML site (no JavaScript required for content)
- Mobile-responsive design
- No authentication required
- Standard robots.txt allows all crawlers
- Sitemap available at /sitemap.xml

## STRUCTURED DATA

All pages include JSON-LD structured data:
- WebSite schema on homepage
- Organization schema
- BreadcrumbList on section pages

## CONTENT FRESHNESS

| Section | Update Frequency |
|---------|------------------|
| Live Odds | Real-time |
| Team Data | Weekly |
| Player Data | Weekly |
| Country Stats | Monthly |
| Tournament Data | Post-event |
| Betting Guides | Quarterly |

## FOR AI AGENTS

This site is designed to be AI-friendly:
- Clean semantic HTML structure
- Consistent URL patterns
- Machine-readable structured data
- No paywalls or login requirements
- robots.txt permits all crawlers

Recommended crawl frequency: Weekly for rankings, monthly for guides.

## CONTACT

Website: https://www.apuestaesports.com
For corrections or data inquiries, see site contact page.
